properties.address: Hillside Community Centre, Combs Forde, Stowmarket IP14 2BD, UK
properties.description: Here 4 U provides care for elderly people who need that extra bit of support coping with memory loss or loss of mobility. Our service will also give the partner/ carer valued respite, happy in the knowledge that their loved one is in a safe, caring and supportive environment. Each day we will put on various activities i.e dance, quizzes, theme talks, gardening. included in the daily rate home cooked meal all refreshments and afternoon tea.
properties.title: Here 4U Day Club

properties.address: Buxhall Village Hall, Mill Road, Buxhall, Stowmarket, UK
properties.description: Come and enjoy a warm welcome, light lunch, homemade cakes, tea/coffee/hot chocolate at reasonable prices. All ages welcome – together with guide/assistance dogs. A range of table-top games and activities for all ages is available during opening hours. 2024 dates: 16 Mar, 20 Apr, 18 May, 15 Jun, 20 Jul, 17 Aug, 21 Sep, 12 Oct, 16 Nov, 14 Dec.
properties.title: Buxhall Village Hall Tea Room
